---
title: "End to End Examples for PK"
---

This site includes end to end examples for PK using `{admiral}` and other [Pharmaverse](https://pharmaverse.org/){target="_blank"} tools

### `{admiral}` -- Use to build CDISC analysis data

[![](images/admiral.png){width="15%"}](https://pharmaverse.github.io/admiral/cran-release/)

### `{metacore}` -- Create and manage metadata for the analysis data

[![](images/metacore.png){width="15%"}](https://atorus-research.github.io/metacore/)

### `{metatools}` -- Work with metadata to derive variables and perform checks

[![](images/metatools.png){width="15%"}](https://pharmaverse.github.io/metatools/)

### `{xportr}` -- Perform checks on data and export to transport file

[![](images/xportr.png){width="15%"}](https://atorus-research.github.io/xportr/)

### `{pharmaversesdtm}` -- Sample Pharmaverse CDISC SDTM data

[![](images/pharmaversesdtm.png){width="15%"}](https://pharmaverse.github.io/pharmaversesdtm/cran-release/)
